ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: FMMK, HEZT designed the research, FMMK, RYAG, FTN, JM, HEZT conducted the analysis, FMMK, RYAG, FTN, HEZT, SAP, JM wrote the manuscript. All authors contributed to the final manuscript and approved its submission. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: Francois M. Moukam Kakmeni would like to express his gratitude to the Deutscher Akademischer Austausch Dienst (DAAD) and the International Centre of Insect Physiology and Ecology (ICIPE), for financial and material support in this research.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The paper used already published information.

sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
Funding
sec.p: No real research funding was obtained to carry out this study; only the first author benefited from a fellowship from DAAD for his upkeep.

sec.title: Publisher’s Note
sec.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
